about_the_game:
Ascend the tower that seems to defy all logic, the first to reach the top floor will be rewarded with everything they could wish for, you won't be the only one trying.

Blood in every direction

Unleash your rage against everyone in any direction, find their vulnerable angle to wreak havoc, and unlock abilities with every victory.

There is no better defense than a good offense

Blocking is two-dimensional, not only will you have to find the perfect moment to block but also the angle from where the attack is coming from to block it in the right direction, if your reflexes are fine enough you will be completely unstoppable.

Boss after boss.

The tower houses different horrors, few but unique in their ways of tormenting you. Your mission will be to find and kill each of them at different heights of the tower.

Feeling alone without being the only person in the room is a terrible feeling.

The end of your ascent will depend on how you have treated those you have encountered on your journey through the tower, decide who you can trust and who can trust you.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia/AMD OpenGL 4.1/DirectX 10.0 level compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Up to changes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo (Dual-Core)
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 3870 / NVidia Geforce 640M / Intel HD4000
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Up to changes

short_description: Wield your sword in the right direction to defeat challenging horrors. Try to make sense of your steps through an impossible tower that changes with your decisions while trying to survive. Prove your Faith.
